name: WP Spam Protecter
author: Rajan V

sections.description: Protuct your blog about spam comments and instantaneously junk messages. This plugin protect your blog with spam comments. Its update comment status if it is jusk or spam comment by bots. And admin can remove spam comments via admin panel
sections.installation:
The simplest way to install the plugin is to use the built-in automatic plugin installer. Go to plugins -> Add New and then enter wp-spam-protecter to automatically install it.

If for some reason the above method doesn’t work then you can download the plugin as a zip file, extract it and then use your favorite FTP client and then upload the contents of the zip file to the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
